attributes.title: My phones glitching
attributes.review: I personally am a big fan of the orange man himself, but after downloading the app, my phone became very slow and would glitch out. I can’t even open the app with it glitching. My phone is practically a literal brick and I now need to delete it Bc my phone is spasming.

attributes.title: absolutely awful don’t get it
attributes.review: first of all, the name of the app needs some fixing because absolutely no one with brain cells has or ever will say those words in the same sentence. unless they’re referring to the date on his tombstone🤞🏼but anyways, i absolutely hate this app and think it deserves to be kicked off the app store because donald trump is a little ugly (a lot. like very ugly.) and it hurts my soul knowing he thinks people care about what he has to say❤️ overall, if i could give this 0 stars, i would.

attributes.title: EW
attributes.review: Now this app has crashed my phone 13 times. This app is not doing well for me or for anyone as I look at the reviews! UGH HATE THIS APP. I got it so I could actually look at what’s happening in the world, but I just got figuring out how to turn my phone back on after it crashing! BAD APP DON’T BUY

attributes.title: Keeps Glitching
attributes.review: 🧚🏻Every time I open the app it glitches and shuts off. It takes about 4-5 times to get the app working. Honestly I just would like to see a better working President and App. But overall I wouldn’t recommend this app to my greatest enemy 🧚🏿‍♂️

attributes.title: ✨𝑡𝑒𝑟𝑟𝑖𝑏𝑙𝑒✨
attributes.review: once i downloaded the app it took several weeks to install. 😡 and once it actually installed my whole phone crashed and i couldn’t do anything for a couple days. i had to completely restart my phone and i am very angry and disappointed with this app, i mean i kinda excepted it to be this terrible. i just wish goodluck to anyone who downloads this app because i almost had to get a new phone. (some people do have to get new phones) so ya danold trump i very much dislike it so ya 😘✨😿😡👺😍🖐🏻

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: When I open the app I went outside to see if I was still on earth because I saw the most weirdest alien and forgot it was the President. But don’t download this app. It hacked all my apps and broke my phone. They also stole 500$ from me a campaign that nobody went to I am furious 😡

attributes.title: Terrible!!!
attributes.review: Every chance I got I opened the app but for some reason it keeps crashing. The quality is poor, it’s promoting dangerous acts. For some reason it says “China Co.” at the bottom. There’s also a strange orange man I’m not sure who he is. This app is so laggy!!! If I could I’d rate it 0 not even worth a star!!!

attributes.title: What is dis hunny-
attributes.review: When I first got the app I was so excited to use it,but then I saw this scary Cheeto looking thing and I dropped my phone out of shock. Now my phone has a giant crack all because of a orange looking man when ever the app opens. Please fix this or tell Bunker Boi to go ahead and log out for me.✌🏾👁👄👁✌🏾

attributes.title: my legs fell off after downloading ✨
attributes.review: this app is horrible please don’t get it!!!! it makes your legs fall off and gives you cancer. This app also gives you viruses on your phone 😡😡😡😡 i had to buy a whole new phone because i have over 10,000 viruses 🥵🥵🥵🥵 DO NOT DOWNLOAD 😡😡😡😡😡😡✨✨✨

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: At first I wanted to upload the app NOT BC OF A TIK TOK I SAW but because I wanted to keep up with the 2020 presidential elections. This app was not helpful at all, it keep crashing and it made my phone really really slow. I had to delete the app to return my phone to a normal state. Please, I advise you not to download this app! It’s a SCAM!!! :(
